:mod:`source.cfg.ctrl_vhz_im_2kW`
=================================

.. py:module:: source.cfg.ctrl_vhz_im_2kW

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   This script configures V/Hz control for an induction motor. The default values
   correspond to a 2.2-kW induction motor.

   ..
       !! processed by numpydoc !!



Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   source.cfg.ctrl_vhz_im_2kW.BaseValues
   source.cfg.ctrl_vhz_im_2kW.CtrlParameters



.. py:class:: BaseValues

   This data class contains the base values computed from the rated values.
   These are used for plotting the results.
















   ..
       !! processed by numpydoc !!

   .. attribute:: w
      :annotation: :float

      

   .. attribute:: i
      :annotation: :float

      

   .. attribute:: u
      :annotation: :float

      

   .. attribute:: p
      :annotation: :int = 2

      

   .. attribute:: psi
      :annotation: :float

      

   .. attribute:: P
      :annotation: :float

      

   .. attribute:: Z
      :annotation: :float

      

   .. attribute:: L
      :annotation: :float

      

   .. attribute:: tau
      :annotation: :float

      


.. py:class:: CtrlParameters

   This data class contains parameters for the V/Hz control system.
















   ..
       !! processed by numpydoc !!

   .. attribute:: sensorless
      :annotation: :bool = True

      

   .. attribute:: T_s
      :annotation: :float = 0.00025

      

   .. attribute:: psi_s_nom
      :annotation: :float

      

   .. attribute:: rate_limit
      :annotation: :float

      

   .. attribute:: R_s
      :annotation: :float = 3.7

      

   .. attribute:: R_R
      :annotation: :float = 2.1

      

   .. attribute:: L_sgm
      :annotation: :float = 0.021

      

   .. attribute:: L_M
      :annotation: :float = 0.224

      

   .. attribute:: w_rb
      :annotation: :float

      

   .. attribute:: alpha_f
      :annotation: :float

      

   .. attribute:: alpha_i
      :annotation: :float

      

   .. attribute:: k_u
      :annotation: :float = 1

      

   .. attribute:: k_w
      :annotation: :float = 4
